data.name: Apotheosis Demo
data.detailed_description:
Gather Allies

During your adventure you will encounter many entities that may aid you if you can convince them to join you. Get a read on their personality, choose the right options and gather the most powerful among them.

Solve Puzzles

Exploration in the surreal universe of Oneiros will test your resourcefulness. Each level will present new themes and puzzles with which to interact. As you progress and learn, puzzles will get harder. They may even blend in with your surroundings...

Customize your party to win!

Absorb their power, transform them into different beings, learn new skills... Discover the extent of the power you can wield through your collection of entities...
data.about_the_game:
Gather Allies

During your adventure you will encounter many entities that may aid you if you can convince them to join you. Get a read on their personality, choose the right options and gather the most powerful among them.

Solve Puzzles

Exploration in the surreal universe of Oneiros will test your resourcefulness. Each level will present new themes and puzzles with which to interact. As you progress and learn, puzzles will get harder. They may even blend in with your surroundings...

Customize your party to win!

Absorb their power, transform them into different beings, learn new skills... Discover the extent of the power you can wield through your collection of entities...
data.short_description: Apotheosis is a single player turn based RPG that takes place in a surreal universe. Discover the powers of the Archetypes that lie within and use them to your advantage. Solve puzzles, explore mazes and unveil the truth about your past.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8300H CPU @ 2.30GHz 2.30 GHz
  • Memory: 8,00 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1050
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
